flavor: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

title: Powerstone Minefield

name: Prophetic Bolt
text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
title: Prophetic Bolt

flavor: I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get.
name: Putrid Warrior
text:
Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one —
• Each player loses 1 life.
• Each player gains 1 life.
title: Putrid Warrior

flavor: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing.
name: Quicksilver Dagger
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card.
title: Quicksilver Dagger

flavor: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.
name: Razorfin Hunter
text: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
title: Razorfin Hunter

flavor: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.
name: Soul Link
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
title: Soul Link

name: Spiritmonger
text:
Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
title: Spiritmonger

name: Squee's Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.
title: Squee's Embrace

name: Squee's Revenge
text: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.
title: Squee's Revenge

name: Suffocating Blast
text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
title: Suffocating Blast

flavor: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.
name: Temporal Spring
text: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
title: Temporal Spring

flavor:
Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
—Gerrard
name: Vindicate
text: Destroy target permanent.
title: Vindicate

name: Yavimaya's Embrace
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
title: Yavimaya's Embrace

name: Fire
text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
title: Fire

name: Ice
text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.
title: Ice

name: Illusion
text: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
title: Illusion

name: Reality
text: Destroy target artifact.
title: Reality

name: Life
text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
title: Life

name: Death
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
title: Death

name: Night
text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
title: Night

name: Day
text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.
title: Day

name: Order
text: Exile target attacking creature.
title: Order

name: Chaos
text: Creatures can't block this turn.
title: Chaos

name: Brass Herald
text:
As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
title: Brass Herald

name: Dodecapod
text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.
title: Dodecapod

flavor: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.
name: Dragon Arch
text: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
title: Dragon Arch

name: Emblazoned Golem
text:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
title: Emblazoned Golem

name: Legacy Weapon
text:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
title: Legacy Weapon

name: Mask of Intolerance
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to him or her.
title: Mask of Intolerance

name: Battlefield Forge
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.
title: Battlefield Forge

name: Caves of Koilos
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.
title: Caves of Koilos

name: Llanowar Wastes
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.
title: Llanowar Wastes

name: Shivan Reef
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.
title: Shivan Reef

name: Yavimaya Coast
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
title: Yavimaya Coast
